评论概述: Good Quality, Great Compliments, Not Too Warm for Summer!
评论详情: The quality was better than I expected, not "high-end great" but for the price and ordering from Amazon, I was surprised. I purchased the tan/khaki and navy. I LOVED how the tan fits. I have a more triangular upper body shape and the shoulders fit perfect and was slightly loose around the waist. The texture/design of the navy does NOT continue onto the back or the sleeve, but it's not enough of a bother for me to return. I received many compliments with both shirts! The shirts can be slightly see-through when stretched but this wasn't an issue for me. If you're concerned about this, I recommend going a size up. Shirts also feel lightweight and breezy so perfect for summer and no sweaty pit stains!

评论概述: Great style but shirt quality is not the best
评论详情: I really love this shirt and the colors and the style.  I typically wash it delicate and air dry.  I was in a bit of a rush today and put it on a delicate dry cycle and it came out as a tank top and completely useless now.  While the style is fantastic I don't expect the shirt to last that long even when you're careful with it.
